articles.title: The Continental: From the World of John Wick teaser gets very ’70s - Polygon
articles.description: Peacock’s three-part John Wick prequel series, The Continental: From the World of John Wick takes the titular hotel back to the ‘70s to show the rise of Ian McShane’s Winston.
articles.content: Turns out assassins loved guns 50 years ago too
